name: Rude Resources RC1
description:
Resources modifications for the Naked Corporation server.

This mod is not compatible with other mdos modifying the LootTable_Resource datatable.
ID Range: none
Prefix: RudeResources

LootTable_Resources (complete override) modifications:
- Rocknoses have a special drop rate from 5 to 35 % of giving Eldarium
- Obsidian node now drops gold at 15% and Eldarium at 10% drop chance as special resources.
author: Rudeboy
